Translations.Text: Seg issekniyen iS: a pwaliv, kecc, akal iqquo; lemmer ad as Nesse$li aman, a d iakwi, ad icuff. Win it id Issadren, d Win ara d Issidren lmeggtin. Ih, Neppa, Izmer i yal cci
Ih, wid issexuaoen issekniyen nne£, ur drigen fellane£. Menyif win ara ipwaveggoen ar tmes, ne$ win ara iasen di laman, ass n tnekra? Xedmet ayen i wen ihwan. Neppa, s tidep, Ipwali ayen txeddmem
Akka, wid inekoen asmekti, mi ten id iusa, u neppat ard Tazmamt tuzmirt
Ur d iusi le$wlav zdat es, ne$ deffir es. D tarusi s$uo Bab n uuwab, Amaazuz
Awal i k id iusan, d win kan id iusan imazanen, uqbel ik. Mass ik, ih, ard Bab n ssmae, d Bab uaaqeb aqeoean

Lemmer Nerri Leqwoan s tmeslayt tabeooanit, a d inin: "lemmer feuulen issekniyen iS s wawal abeooani, u s taaoabt"? Ini: "neppa, i wid iumnen, d nnhaya u d ccafuaa. Wid ur numin ara, aaegent tmejjin nnsen. Neppa, i nitni, d tider$elt. Widak pwanecden seg umkan ibaaden
Ni$ Nefka yas Tazmamt i Musa. Mgarraden fellas. Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal s$uo Mass ik, yili tefra garasen. Nitni, fellas, di ccekk imcebbwel
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win iccven, mgal iman is. Mass ik ur Idennis ara imdanen
